subject: Last CFP:: GTMC- USA
body:
Apologies for cross-postings!

Please consider to contribute to and/or forward to the appropriate groups the following opportunity to submit and publish original scientific papers to the GTMC2015 conference 
-------------------------------------------------------------------
CALL FOR PAPERS
----------------

The Global Technology Management Conference (GTMC2015)

July 15 - 17, 2015

Bemidji State University, Minnesota, USA 

http://sdiwc.net/conferences/gtmc2015/ 

-------------------------------------------------------------------
The conference welcome papers on the following (but not limited to) research topics:

* Computer Science
* Business, and Technology In Education
* Information Management
* Information Technology
* Manufacturing Systems
* Engineering Technology

-------------------------------------------------------------------
Important Dates

Submission Dates       : Extended to June 25, 2015
Notification of Acceptance: 3-5 days of the submission date 
Camera Ready Submission: Open from now until  July 05, 2015
Registration           : Open from now until  July 05, 2015
Conference Dates       : July 15 - 17, 2015




----------------------------------------

If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://sdiwc.us/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65ab738930892aa4d0afd733e0f72a38
